name: I Am Goblin
description:
I Am Goblin  is a goblin survival game involving normal survival style aspects like gathering/crafting and improving one's lot with the added layer of goblin societal/tribal demands and frustrations. Set in an infinite procedurally generated world every game seed is different and your resource expectations will have to alter to match what you're dealt to start with. Many vast biomes including desert, ice tundras & underwater sea scapes hold food, treasures and even danger.

Although I'm making good progress with this new game of mine it's still very definitely considered "early prototype", not even "pre-alpha".

Follow along and join the discussion on Discord.
